creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Hilly landscape with stream and flowering trees; an open-air residential structure spans the first three panels populated by men and women in deep contemplation, playing games, and reading; gold covers majority of surface and is applied in powdered form, flakes, and strips; slivers of silver also present
medium: Ink, color, gold, and silver on gilded paper
title: Scenes from the Tales of Saigyō
